1792.quoteText:
you agree not to use or provide software (except general purpose web browsers and email clients) or services that interact or interoperate with CL, e.g.
for downloading, uploading, creating/accessing/using an account, posting, flagging, emailing, searching, or mobile use.
You agree not to copy/collect CL content via robots, spiders, scripts, scrapers, crawlers, or any automated or manual equivalent (e.g., by hand).
1792.title: Users cannot scrape the website of the service

tosdr.case: Users cannot scrape the website of the service

2037.quoteText:
Any claim, cause of action, demand, or dispute arising from or related to CL ("Claims") will be governed by the internal laws of California, without regard to conflict of law provisions, except to the extent governed by US federal law.
Any Claims will be exclusively resolved by courts in San Francisco, CA (except we may seek preliminary or injunctive relief anywhere).
2037.title: The court of law governing the terms is in California

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
